data.message: In the end - you shouldn't throw stones when you live in a big ass glass house, my friend.  What kind of GOOD are you doing?  It's usually the folks who are doing nothing that criticize the most......

replies.message: Actually, Eminem is an incredibly charitable philanthropist, he most recently just donated to hurricane relief

Now if he can only figure out how to stop spewing misinformed negativity and unintelligent divisiveness.  Like many out there, he should stop getting his news from the television and main stream media. This will hurt his career (even more). Hopefully he'll realize he's no barrel of factual information when it comes to politics & leave it alone.  I'd prefer he at least prop up a candidate he DOES like.
